title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 276.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 276.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Subdivision 1 of section
33
of the

Public Lands Law authorizes the Commissioner of General Services to pay a
commission, when offered, to a licensed real estate broker upon sufficient
evidence that said broker brought about the sale of unappropriated State land. This Part implements that authority and establishes standards and requirements
pertaining to such payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
276.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
